languages.text: {n}Маражай застывает на месте. Вы выдерживаете разъяренный взгляд друкари, полный обещания мук и страданий... и почти что видите, как внутри друкари что-то подается, заставляя его чуть склонить голову.{/n} "Пусть будет по-твоему, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай застывает на месте. Вы выдерживаете разъяренный взгляд друкари, полный обещания мук и страданий... и почти что видите, как внутри друкари что-то подается, заставляя его чуть склонить голову. Ксенос смотрит на вас иначе — с выражением странного, почти что возбужденного подчинения.{/n} "Пусть будет по твоему, {name}".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai freezes. You meet his enraged gaze, filled with the promise of torture and agony... but then you almost see something inside him give, forcing him to incline his head slightly.{/n} "Let it be as you say, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай застывает на месте. Вы выдерживаете разъяренный взгляд друкари, полный обещания мук и страданий... и почти что видите, как внутри друкари что-то подается, заставляя его чуть склонить голову.{/n} "Пусть будет по-твоему, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai freezes. You meet his enraged gaze, filled with the promise of torture and agony... but then you almost see something inside him give, forcing him to incline his head slightly.{/n} "Let it be as you say, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai freezes. You meet his enraged gaze filled with promise of torture and agony... but then you practically see something inside him give, forcing him to incline his head slightly. The xenos is now looking at you differently — with an expression of strange, almost aroused subservience.{/n} "Let it be as you say, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai freezes. You meet his enraged gaze, filled with the promise of torture and agony... but then you almost see something inside him give, forcing him to incline his head slightly.{/n} "Let it be as you say, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai freezes. You meet his enraged gaze filled with the promise of torture and agony... but then you almost see something inside him give, forcing him to incline his head slightly. The xenos is now looking at you differently — with an expression of strange, almost aroused subservience.{/n} "Let it be as you say, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai freezes. You meet his enraged gaze, filled with the promise of torture and agony... but then you almost see something inside him give, forcing him to incline his head slightly.{/n} "Let it be as you say, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai freezes. You meet his enraged gaze, filled with the promise of torture and agony... but then you almost see something inside him give, forcing him to incline his head slightly.{/n} "Let it be as you say, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai s'immobilise. Vous croisez son regard enragé, portant la promesse de longues tortures et d'une lente agonie... mais il incline subitement la tête, comme si quelque chose avait cédé en lui.{/n} « Qu'il en soit donc ainsi, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes. You meet his enraged gaze, filled with the promise of torture and agony... but then you almost see something inside him give, forcing him to incline his head slightly.{/n} "Let it be as you say, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai s'immobilise. Vous croisez son regard enragé, portant la promesse de longues tortures et d'une lente agonie... mais il incline subitement la tête, comme si quelque chose avait cédé en lui. Le xénos vous regarde désormais différemment, avec une expression servile et soumise, où semble même pointer un soupçon de désir.{/n} « Qu'il en soit donc ainsi, {name}. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが動きを止める。かち合ったその瞳は、拷問と苦痛を予感させる怒りに満ちている。しかし、彼の中で何かが浮かんだのか、仕方なさそうに首をかすかに傾げた。{/n}「お前の言う通りにしようじゃないか、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes. You meet his enraged gaze, filled with the promise of torture and agony... but then you almost see something inside him give, forcing him to incline his head slightly.{/n} "Let it be as you say, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが動きを止める。かち合ったその瞳は、拷問と苦痛を予感させる怒りに満ちている。しかし、彼の中で何かが浮かんだのか、仕方なさそうに首をかすかに傾げた。{/n}「お前の言う通りにしようじゃないか、{name}」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋愣在了原地，你看到他的目光中充满了愤怒，仿佛迫不及待地想要折磨你，让你痛苦……但在那之后，你看到他内心中似乎有什么东西屈服了。他微微地侧着头，看着你。{/n}“那就这样吧，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes. You meet his enraged gaze, filled with the promise of torture and agony... but then you almost see something inside him give, forcing him to incline his head slightly.{/n} "Let it be as you say, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋愣在了原地，你看到他的目光中充满了愤怒，仿佛迫不及待地想要折磨你，让你痛苦……但在那之后，你看到他内心中似乎有什么东西屈服了。他微微地侧着头，看着你，眼神也发生了变化。他的目光中带着某种古怪的、几乎像是渴切的服从。{/n}“那就这样吧，{name}。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai erstarrt. Du begegnest seinem zornigen Blick voll des Versprechens von Folter und Qual ... doch dann siehst du fast, wie etwas in ihm nachgibt und ihn zwingt, leicht den Kopf zu neigen.{/n} "So sei es, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes. You meet his enraged gaze, filled with the promise of torture and agony... but then you almost see something inside him give, forcing him to incline his head slightly.{/n} "Let it be as you say, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai erstarrt. Du begegnest seinem zornigen Blick voll des Versprechens von Folter und Qual ... doch dann siehst du fast, wie etwas in ihm nachgibt und ihn zwingt, leicht den Kopf zu neigen. Der Xenos sieht dich nun anders an, mit einem Ausdruck der sonderbaren, fast erregten Unterwürfigkeit.{/n} "So sei es, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se queda paralizado. Su mirada se cruza con la tuya, augurándote mil torturas y agonías... pero luego te da la sensación de que algo cede en su interior y le obliga a inclinar ligeramente la cabeza.{/n} «Como ordenes, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes. You meet his enraged gaze, filled with the promise of torture and agony... but then you almost see something inside him give, forcing him to incline his head slightly.{/n} "Let it be as you say, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se queda paralizado. Su mirada se cruza con la tuya, augurándote mil torturas y agonías... pero luego te da la sensación de que algo cede en su interior y le obliga a inclinar ligeramente la cabeza. El xenos te mira ahora de otro modo, con una peculiar expresión de sumisión que casi parece excitarle.{/n} «Como ordenes, {name}».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai donuyor. Bir yandan öfkeli bakışları, işkence ve ızdırap vadediyor. Öte yandan sanki içindeki bir şey, onu başını hafifçe eğmeye zorluyor.{/n} "Dediğin gibi olsun {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes. You meet his enraged gaze, filled with the promise of torture and agony... but then you almost see something inside him give, forcing him to incline his head slightly.{/n} "Let it be as you say, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai donuyor. Öfkeli bakışları işkence ve ızdırap vadediyor ancak sonrasında sanki içinde bir şeylerin başını hafifçe eğmeye zorladığını hissediyorsun.{/n} "Dediğin gibi olsun {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
